response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you and meet all your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it's worth every penny of its $1,500,000 price tag. Considering its immense worth to you, I am offering it to you at this exclusive price. This opportunity is tailored specifically for you, and I hope you'll see the same level of importance in this offer as I do. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 1500000}
